statements: SELECT * FROM project_tasks;
SELECT task_name, progress FROM project_tasks WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, progress FROM project_tasks WHERE progress IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-09-30'
SELECT task_id, progress FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-10-15' ORDER BY progress DESC
SELECT task_name, progress FROM project_tasks WHERE progress BETWEEN 25 AND 75
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%report%'
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT assignee_name, task_name FROM task_assignees JOIN project_tasks ON task_assignees.task_id = project_tasks.task_id;
SELECT * FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT task_name, progress FROM project_tasks ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, task_name FROM task_assignees JOIN project_tasks ON task_assignees.task_id = project_tasks.task_id WHERE deadline >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, progress FROM project_tasks WHERE progress < 25 AND task_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY progress ASC;
SELECT * FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_id = 2;
SELECT task_name, assignee_name FROM project_tasks JOIN task_assignees ON project_tasks.task_id = task_assignees.task_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM project_tasks WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM project_tasks JOIN task_deadlines ON project_tasks.task_id = task_deadlines.task_id;
SELECT * FROM task_progress WHERE completed=true ORDER BY progress_status ASC;
SELECT task_name, progress_description FROM project_tasks JOIN task_progress ON project_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE progress_status='On Hold';
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) AS num_deadlines FROM task_deadlines GROUP BY task_id HAVING num_deadlines > 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-10-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, progress_status, progress_description FROM project_tasks JOIN task_progress ON project_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date, reminder FROM project_tasks JOIN task_deadlines ON project_tasks.task_id = task_deadlines.task_id WHERE reminder = TRUE;

SELECT task_name, progress_status, progress_description, completed FROM project_tasks JOIN task_progress ON project_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE task_name LIKE 'Task%' ORDER BY completed ASC, progress_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE progress < 50;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT task_name, deadline, progress FROM tasks WHERE deadline > NOW() ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE LENGTH(project_description) > 10
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%'
SELECT task_name, progress FROM tasks JOIN task_assignment ON tasks.task_id = task_assignment.task_id WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status FROM task WHERE deadline < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, deadline FROM project WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC, deadline ASC;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM task WHERE status='in progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, deadline FROM project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT task_id, progress_percentage FROM task_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
